::Battera::

"Are we going to hold the peace talks there in the mountain?"  She 
sighed, "I was so close to...to.."  She couldn't help but choke up a 
little.  She saw her dreams of peace shatter and skatter to the 
wind.  She lowered her head,"I'll be there as soon as I can."
She lowered her head and let a tear roll down her cheek.
She whispered,"and the war will continue."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "David Torrey" <Dachande85@m...> wrote:
> ::CyberShark::
> 
>     "I don't know why he's abandoning the base," CyberShark 
said. "He sent a message and said that I was to go to the Mountain 
base, and that I should contact them when I was ready to go."
